author: smuzaffar
body:
This Pr moves `L1Trigger/Phase2L1GMT/interface/Constants.h` header to `DataFormats/L1TMuonPhase2/interface/Constants.h` to avoid dataformats dependency on `L1Trigger/Phase2L1GMT` package. This should fix the FWLite build errors too.

This is just a technical update and can be merged as soon as the build part is done ( no need to wait for full addon, relvals and comparison tests).
title: Move L1TMuonPhase2/Constants.h to L1TMuonPhase2 dataformat package
